mbean:
Cleanup service to correct duplicated file entries (using same filePath) in ONLINE_STORAGE and trash
Correction steps:
1) Files with same file references on RW filesystems of configured OnlineFsGroup will be copied to avoid data loss if such a file gets deleted.
The Patient/Study/Series/Instance about this duplicated files are logged in <LOG_DIR>/cleanup.log and can be used to manually correct this issues.
2) Files in trash which filePath are also referenced in folder will be deleted from trash.
org.dcm4chee.cleanup.sar.CleanupDuplicatedFilesService The default constructor CleanupDuplicatedFilesService Filesystem group ID of online storage to check duplicates on RW file systems. OnlineFsGroup java.lang.String &defaultAttributes; &defaultOperations; Count duplicated file references in configured online storage group countDuplicates int Show duplicated file references in configured online storage group showDuplicates java.lang.String Count trash files which are also referenced in folder. countDuplicatedTrashFiles int Show trash files which are also referenced in folder. showDuplicatedTrashFiles java.lang.String Cleanup folder and trash to correct duplicated file references.
1) Duplicated files in folder are renamed.
2) Files in trash which are also referenced in folder are removed.
Info about duplicated files in folder are listed in <LOG_DIR>/cleanup.log. cleanup java.lang.String
